body.name: ZIOVO 2023 Newest Tablet 11 inch Android 13 Tablets, 16GB RAM+256GB ROM+1TB Expand, Octa-Core 2.0GHz, 2K 2000 x 1200 FHD Display, 8600mAh, 13MP+5MP Camera, 5G+2.4G Wi-Fi/Bluetooth/with Case-Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 48 mins
features: 【11-inch Large IPS Display & 13MP +5MP Camera】The 11-inch tablet is equipped with a 2k 2000*1200 resolution HD touchscreen with a larger viewing area and wider field of view, supporting split-screen operation, which brings you immersive visual enjoyment whether you're playing games, watching movies, reading, taking notes, or working.The 13MP rear camera and 5MP front-facing camera, plus a 2MP macro camera, feature a wider viewing angle for brighter, more lifelike photos.

【256GB ROM Mega Memory & Google Certified】Android 13 tablet comes with 16GB (8GB physical + 8GB virtual) RAM + 256GB ROM with up to 1TB storage using MicroSD card.The tablet is GMS Google certified, you can download and install daily apps such as YouTube, Instagram and more through the pre-installed Play store, store your favorite songs, photos, movies, games, etc. It supports split-screen operation, so you can fully enjoy reading, watching videos, studying and surfing the internet.

【Latest Android 13 + 2.0Ghz Octa-Core Processor】 The powerful Z128 tablet is powered by the latest Android 13 and a powerful 2.0Ghz octa-core processor, providing a more personalized, secure, and easy-to-operate system experience, with a high-speed CPU and processor that responds and switches between apps quickly, allowing you to play games, watch movies, and read smoothly, enjoying a smooth experience.

【8600mAh Large Battery + Dual Band WiFi】8600mAh large battery with long-lasting battery life, standby up to 10 hours, accompanying you from day to night, allowing you to read, browse the web, watch videos and listen to music easily at home, while traveling or on business trips, and can be charged easily via USB Type-C port. Support 2.4G & 5G WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, can connect to the Internet quickly and stably, so you can enjoy a faster Internet experience and data transfer experience.

【2 Years Warranty Service】ZIOVO Z128 tablet package includes 1* tablet, 1* case, 1* screen protector, 1* data cable, 1* charger and other necessary accessories, it is a must-have companion for daily work, entertainment and road trips. We provide 2 years warranty for the tablet, if you have any questions about this tablet, please contact us, we will have professional staff to provide you with technical support and customer service within 24 hours, free of worries for you.
body.description: 2023 Newest Tablet 11 inch Android 13 Tablets, 16GB RAM+256GB ROM+1TB Expand, Octa-Core 2.0GHz, 2K 2000 x 1200 FHD Display,8600mAh, 13MP+5MP Camera, 5G+2.4G Wi-Fi/Bluetooth/with Case Specification: OS: Android 13 Screen Size: 11.1 inch CPU: Octa-Core, 2.0GHZ RAM: 16GB(8+8 Virtual) RAM ROM: 256GB Storage External Storage：Support up to 512 GB Micro SD Card Connection: 5G+2.4GHZ WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0 Resolution: 2000*1200 support 1080p video playback Hardware Configuration: Interfaces: Type C port, Micro SD Card slot, Earphone port, Mic supported Camera: 13MP + 2 MP Rear and 5MP Front Battery: 8600mAh Package includes: 1. 11 inch Tablet with Case 2. 1* Screen Protector 3. Charging Adapter with Type C Cable 4. Well-designed Box 5. User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this tablet. It's larger than I had expected so will be great for me for work or my kids to watch their shows. It came with everything I need, including a hard cover case and screen protector. Best of all it came with its own charging block! I know that might sound silly but nothing comes with a block these days and I'm always having to switch my electronics out to charge so that was nice. It was very easy to set up, super fast, and most importantly super easy to use. It takes great pictures too! I love how easy it is to read everything on the screen so it would be good for older folks too who might have a little bit harder time seeing. Recommend the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Tablet with Android 13
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with this tablet. From the moment I opened the package I continue to be impressed.Video, Audio , Camera and every other aspect of this unit works well because someone took pride in making it right.Packaging was excellent.Setup was a breeze (other than Google and my phone not cooperating so I can authenticate)Screen is 11 inches, which works great for my "older" eyes, very bright and unbelievable quality.Sound quality is great for small speaker and has a volume booster in the settings.Both front and rear facing cameras are very clear and auto focus is responsive, so you can use it for video calls or snapping photos.RAM is good and you can convert some of the storage space to improve the performance if needed in Memory Extension under settings.Slim built and the included case is much better than most out there as it is made with a wrap around silicon based material that will not break when dropped or squeezed. BTW they included a screen protector for those of us that tend to drop things and and crack screens.It is all the small things that make me happy as a user and someone has thought this tablet through before making it. Kudos to all involved for a great product at a small price.Do not hesitate to buy it ! You can't go wrong with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome price/quality combination. For this price my expectations were not that high, but was well surprised. Screen is pretty decent, easy to watch full-hd movies. 4K videos are usually lagging, but 2k runs okay. Sound from external speakers is loud and works well for watching mvoies (music not so much). 8gb ram is more then enough and this tablet is flying. Good thing is that it comes with it's cover as well. The only thing was the shipping. It was stating initially that it was probably delivered but it wasn't so I requested a refund which I got immediately, but a week later the tablet arrived. Otherwise happily surprised with the tablet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Tablet and Accessories!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I just got my tablet a few days ago, and I'm truly enjoying it. I'm writing this review using the Bluetooth keyboard and the mouse that came with the tablet. The keyboard is essentially a full-sized keyboard, minus the number pad that nobody uses anyway. The keyboard has a slot in the back that securely holds the tablet and makes this feel more like a laptop than a tablet. The mouse connects via a USB dongle, and works even on smooth flat surfaces. So far, I'm very impressed with the tablet itself. The video rendering speed, the sound/volume, the battery life -- all excellent, and all figure heavily into the great value for money that you'll get with this unit. I've also had some interaction with the support staff, and they were very prompt and helpful. You cannot go wrong with this tablet! If you have any questions of me, please don't hesitate to ask!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't act like top specs...
reviews.reviewText: I was super stoked about this. Amazing top of the line specs and so much cheaper than others with similar specs. However, despite updating everything and even trying to run Nova Launcher to make it run better, it was janky and slow. Unfortunately had to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value - Lots of storage space
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This tablet has been easy to set up. I got this for my wife (she now has a better tablet than me!) I have installed several apps and there is LOTS of storage space still available. I like the type C charging port-common to android devices now. The sound is great-we like to use it in landscape mode to watch streaming shows/movies. The battery holds up well- I turned down the brightness which has helped to extend the battery. It comes with a case to protect it and a screen saver. I would recommend this tablet if you are looking for a great Android tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well, I've decided not to gift this after all..
reviews.reviewText: Came 84% charged, charged to full quicklyHeavy, sturdy feel. I like the cover that protects the screen while telling you the size of the screen for convenience. Also shows OS, internal storage, RAM, CPU, battery size, and camera quality for both cameras. (Android 13, 256 internal storage, 16GB, 2.0 GHz Octacore, 8600, Front: 5.0 - Rear: 13.0)My S23 Ultra battery is 5000 mAh, for some context. I believe this has been the most impressive battery yet in a (Samsung popular choices or Apple) cell phone.The screen is wonderfully responsive and the OS responds quickly.I will be using this for work related things, I think, since it performs so reliably and I very much enjoy using this tablet. So much for possibly giving it as a gift like I originally planned!! Lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use a tablet solely for playing a phone game called Hay Day. My Amazon Fire 10 recently died and since it doesn't have the Google Play Store, I was hoping this would be a good replacement. It was not. Compared to the Fire the screen feels very cheap to the touch and my finger does not glid easily. The case is also a little wonky. More importantly in game, when trying to zoom in and out, it was not responsive. A lot of my touches were not registering at all, so I played for about two minutes, and this went back into the box for a return. I did not realize an off brand would be so off. Oh well. I guess I will try my luck with Samsung.
